name: From Construction Dust to Copper Kettles
caption: Permafrost-proof foundations, customs delays, and stubborn logistics tried to slow us down, but the brewhouse is finally humming and the taproom lights are on.
imageAlt: Brewery team inspecting stainless steel tanks

name: What Alpine Water Gives to Our Beer
caption: Glacial runoff filtered through granite delivers mineral balance and gentle softness, letting our malts and hops speak with clarity in every glass.
imageAlt: Mountain stream flowing through alpine rocks

name: Cans, Bottles, and the Honest Choice
caption: Cans keep light out, ship light, and recycle endlessly—better for the beer and the Alps. If that reality feels harsh, it may be time to rethink what progress looks like.
imageAlt: Stacked aluminum beer cans in a brewery

name: Opening Weekend Reflections
caption: We tapped the first kegs for neighbors, hikers, and curious passersby—proof that a community brewery can feel like home from day one.
imageAlt: People raising beer glasses in celebration
